page.title: 16Employment in Whitminster.
page.content:
Continued from page 15.
An example of a light industrial employer in the area is {WHITMINSTER {ENGINEERING.}This firm make the machines that make the cardboard tubes that go inside paper rolls such as kitchen rolls and toilet rolls. They have operated from their present site for some six years and employ 6 people. Their employees live in Gloucester, Stonehouse, Dursley and Frampton. This means that the majority of people who work here have to travel to work from outside the area.
The company sells three quarters of its tools to places like Nigeria and South America. The company also rebuilds a lot of machines and designs new ones. Continued on page 17.
